datepicker error title
function checkDatepicker(obj_id, required) {
  var isPass = true;
  var id = $(":input[name='HiddenFieldID" + obj_id + "']").val();
  var checked = true;
	
  $('#data_query_error_message_' + id).hide();
  $('#data_query_error_message_' + id).html("");
  $('#ErrMsg' + obj_id).hide();
  $('#ErrMsg' + obj_id).html("");
  var str = $('#Field' + obj_id).val();
  if(str == "" || str == null || isNaN(str)){
    checked = false;
  }
	
  if (required && !checked) {
    $('#Field'+obj_id).addClass('errorBorder');
    isPass = false;
    if(errorMsgArr[obj_id]["emptyErrorMsg"]!=''&&errorMsgArr[obj_id]["emptyErrorMsg"]!='undefined'&&errorMsgArr[obj_id]["emptyErrorMsg"].length > 0){
      if('{##get_flang}' == 'chi' || '{##get_flang}' == '' || '{##get_flang}' == 'noparam:flang') {
        if($('#foli' + obj_id + '>.showOverFlow>.showOverFlow').html().search('ErrMsg'+ obj_id +'-1') == '-1'){
          $('#foli' + obj_id + '>.showOverFlow>.showOverFlow>.showOverFlow').after('
請選擇預約日期。
');
        }
        // document.getElementById("ErrMsg" + obj_id).innerHTML = errorMsgArr[obj_id]["emptyErrorMsg"];
        document.getElementById("ErrMsg" + obj_id).innerHTML = '請選擇預約時間。';
      } else {
        if($('#foli' + obj_id + '>.showOverFlow>.showOverFlow').html().search('ErrMsg'+ obj_id +'-1') == '-1'){
          $('#foli' + obj_id + '>.showOverFlow>.showOverFlow>.showOverFlow').after('
Please select a date before submitting the form.
');
        }
        // document.getElementById("ErrMsg" + obj_id).innerHTML = errorMsgArr[obj_id]["emptyErrorMsg"];
        document.getElementById("ErrMsg" + obj_id).innerHTML = 'Please select a time before submitting the form.';
      }
      globalErrorMessage = globalErrorMessage + "\r\n"+errorMsgArr[obj_id]["emptyErrorMsg"];
    }else{
      if('{##get_flang}' == 'chi' || '{##get_flang}' == '' || '{##get_flang}' == 'noparam:flang') {
        if($('#foli' + obj_id + '>.showOverFlow>.showOverFlow').html().search('ErrMsg'+ obj_id +'-1') == '-1'){
          $('#foli' + obj_id + '>.showOverFlow>.showOverFlow>.showOverFlow').after('
請選擇預約日期。
');
        }
        document.getElementById("ErrMsg" + obj_id).innerHTML = "請選擇預約時間。";
      } else {
        if($('#foli' + obj_id + '>.showOverFlow>.showOverFlow').html().search('ErrMsg'+ obj_id +'-1') == '-1'){
          $('#foli' + obj_id + '>.showOverFlow>.showOverFlow>.showOverFlow').after('
Please select a date before submitting the form.
');
        }
        document.getElementById("ErrMsg" + obj_id).innerHTML = "Please select a time before submitting the form.";
      }
			
      globalErrorMessage = globalErrorMessage + "\r\nPlease fill the text field";
    }
    if('{##get_flang}' == 'chi' || '{##get_flang}' == '' || '{##get_flang}' == 'noparam:flang') {
      if($('#Field' + obj_id).prev('div').find('input.datepicker-event').val() == $('#Field8 option:selected').text()){
        $('#ErrMsg'+ obj_id +'-1').show();
      }else{
        $('#ErrMsg'+ obj_id +'-1').hide();
      }
    }else{
      if($('#Field' + obj_id).prev('div').find('input.datepicker-event').val() == $('#Field9 option:selected').text()){
        $('#ErrMsg'+ obj_id +'-1').show();
      }else{
        $('#ErrMsg'+ obj_id +'-1').hide();
      }
    }
    if(errorDisplayWay=='UseRedBoxErrorMessageInWebform')
      document.getElementById("ErrMsg" + obj_id).style.display = "block";
    document.getElementById("itemOnPage" + obj_id).style.display = "block";
  } else {

    if('{##get_flang}' == 'chi' || '{##get_flang}' == '' || '{##get_flang}' == 'noparam:flang') {
      if($('#Field' + obj_id).prev('div').find('input.datepicker-event').val() == $('#Field8 option:selected').text()){
        $('#ErrMsg'+ obj_id +'-1').show();
      }else{
        $('#ErrMsg'+ obj_id +'-1').hide();
      }
    }else{
      if($('#Field' + obj_id).prev('div').find('input.datepicker-event').val() == $('#Field9 option:selected').text()){
        $('#ErrMsg'+ obj_id +'-1').show();
      }else{
        $('#ErrMsg'+ obj_id +'-1').hide();
      }
    }

    if (checked && !checkDatePickerQuota(obj_id)) {
      $('#Field' + obj_id).addClass('errorBorder');
      isPass = false;
      globalErrorMessage = globalErrorMessage + "\r\nThe limit of this date " + obj_id + " is exceeded";
      document.getElementById("ErrMsg" + obj_id).innerHTML = "The limit of this date is exceeded";
      if (errorDisplayWay == 'UseRedBoxErrorMessageInWebform')
        document.getElementById("ErrMsg" + obj_id).style.display = "block";
      document.getElementById("itemOnPage" + obj_id).style.display = "block";
    } else {
      document.getElementById("ErrMsg" + obj_id).style.display = "none";
      document.getElementById("ErrMsg" + obj_id).innerHTML = "";
    }
  }
  return isPass;
}
